transcript:
Customer: Hello.
Executive: Hello. IndiaMART? Sorry.
Executive: Sandeep [unintelligible] bataiye IndiaMART mein aapka swagat hai kya madad kar sakta hu sir?
Customer: Ah sir mai Utkarsh Patil baat kar raha hu actually mai aapka TrustSeal customer hu.
Executive: Hmm.
Customer: Ah mujhe ek dikkat aayi hai aaj. Ah me mujhe na ek buyer ka call aaya tha do din pehle.
Executive: Thik hai.
Customer: Thik hai. To wo sabhi quotation wagera proceed karne ke baad sir abhi tak payment ke upar aaya aaya hai aur abhi wo kya bol raha hai ki payment aapko ah pehle verification ke liye mujhe unko bhejna padega ₹5.
Executive: Thik hai.
Customer: Haan unka phone number mujhe khali bas.
Executive: Ek second haan.
Customer: 8095
Executive: 8095
Customer: 87
Executive: 87
Customer: 95
Executive: 95
Customer: 16
Executive: Iske alawa koi other number sir?
Customer: Ah aap GST number le sakte ho unka?
Executive: Okay GST number nahi sir bataiyega GST number.
Customer: 27
Executive: 27
Customer: Triple A
Executive: Triple A
Customer: Triple A A A A for apple Triple Triple A
Executive: Triple A
Customer: GC G for go C for cat.
Executive: Ji.
Customer: 02
Executive: Ji.
Customer: 77
Executive: Ji.
Customer: Q Q for quality.
Executive: True.
Customer: One
Executive: One.
Customer: Z
Executive: Z
Customer: Four.
Executive: Line par rahiyega sir.

Executive: Kya customer ka naam Gaurav hai sir?
Customer: [unintelligible]
Customer: Customer naam aapne kya bataya aap?
Customer: Bhuvneshwar karke bataya.
Customer: Kya?
Customer: Bhuvneshwar karke bataya unhone.
Executive: Thik hai. Sir jo GST aapne bataya us GST ke bihaf se mai bata deta hu ek second.

Executive: Thik hai. Jo GST aapne bataya GST ke bihaf se mai bata deta hu ki ye company hamare paas registered to hai sir lekin ye company jo hai wo disable mein registered hai disable ka matlab ye hota hai ki agar wo company kisi ke sath fraud kari ho ya fir koi aisa kam kari ho jisse hame shak hua hai IndiaMART ko ki ye koi galat jo hai kuch galat issues mein ya fir galat chakkar mein kisi ko dalne ke chakkar mein hai to in sare scenarios mein jo hai hum isko high risk suspected mein ya fir hum isko company ko disable kar dete hai to inki jo company hai isi wajah se disable company mein hai thik hai to agar inse aap koi bhi deal karte hai ya koi bhi payment karte hai to bahut satark aur savdhani ke sath kariyega thik hai hamara jo hai basically itna sa hame matchmaking ke dauran bataya jata hai sari chizo se related ki agar koi high risk suspected hota hai ya disable company hoti hai thik hai to mostly kis sirf uska yahi karan hota hai ki wo fraud karke baithi hoti hai kisi ke sath yahi koi fraud attempt karne ki koshish karti hai thik hai to in dono ke bihaf pe is company ko disable kar diya jata hai band kar diya jata hai usko hamesha ke liye IndiaMART ke through thik hai.
Customer: Mujhe bhi doubt aa raha hai kyuki itna hum bhi business karte hai koi bhi transaction ke liye itna amount aap pehle kar rahe hai to nahi hota hai na kidhar bhi.
Executive: Ji ji.
Customer: To aap unko koi band jo koi aisa khata ho jisme balance nahi ho to usse ₹5 transfer kar nahi nahi wo kya bol raha hai mai wo bhi try karunga na lekin wo kya bol raha hai jo jis account pe unka payment aayega na usi account pe wo karenge.
Executive: Hmm. Haan Sandeep ji agar aapko aisa suspected user lag rahe hai to khud hi un sab chakkar mein mat fasiye agar unko directly dekhiye jisko payment karna rehta hai wo directly ₹5 ₹2 karne ke chakkar mein nahi rehta hai wo khud hi dalta hai aapke account mein ₹1 aur bolta hai sir check kar lijiye aaya hai ki nahi aaya hai agar aaya hai to mai baki payment aapko kar raha hu thik hai isi tarike se short form mein chize chalti hai agar aapko duvidha lag rahi hai to is chakkar mein mat fasiye sir thik hai.
Customer: Yes okay sir okay thank you so much baki koi samasya aayegi to please mujhe call kar lijiye iske alawa koi other sir madad.
Customer: Nahi nahi sir abhi tak chal thik hai nahi nahi chal India IndiaMART ke through koi other services mein problem sir aapko?
Customer: Nahi nahi sir nahi okay sir.
Executive: Thik hai to sir ye jo aapne ek ticket raise kiya hai mai ticket sir isko close kar du aapki permission ho to.
Customer: Haan close kijiye na please.
Executive: Thik hai sir aapko ek satisfaction ka mail jayega please usko satisfied mark kar dijiyega taki lagatar hum jo hai aapki madad isi tarike se karte rahe sir. Sure sure mai aapka account manager Anand Vajpayee baat kar raha hu thik hai. Thank you so much. Okay thank you so much.
summary:
Concerns:

- Customer received a call from a buyer.

- Buyer asked to send ₹5 for verification.

- Customer suspects fraudulent activity.



Resolution:

- Executive verified the buyer's GST number.

- Executive informed the company is disabled.

- Advised caution and not to proceed with payment.

- Executive offered to close the ticket.



Next Steps: 

- Executive will send a satisfaction mail.



Alert (If Any):

fraud

@@@Sentiment:

- Angry -> Satisfied



@@@Key Topics:

- fraud, payment, trustseal, disable company, verification
